timeline.message:
Bump tektoncd/pipeline to v0.12.1

This will bump tektoncd/pipeline to v0.12.1 for both
v1alpha and v1beta1 resource.
Also use the respective dep as in the main project

timeline.bodyText:
The test suite is named V1alpha1PipelineCrudTest
Maybe we should create a V1beta1PipelineCrudTest suite with v1beta1 specific tests.
timeline.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: Ok, sorry, missed the first part of the import. I suppose something has changed in the base v1alpha1 api (but this change is weird for me nonetheless)
replies.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: that's caused by the update of the v1alpha1 dependency
replies.author: Fabian-K
